Name: Acolyte
Starting Items: Holy Symbol, Robes, Healer's Kit, 10 GP
Description: Raised in a temple to serve the gods.

Name: Squire
Starting Items: Chainmail, Longsword, Shield, 10 GP
Description: Trained in the martial arts under a knight.

Name: Apprentice
Starting Items: Spellbook, Robes, Ink/Pen, Component Pouch
Description: Studied magic in a tower or academy.

Name: Thief
Starting Items: Leather Armor, Dagger, Thieves' Tools, 15 GP
Description: Survived by taking what wasn't yours.

Name: Ranger
Starting Items: Longbow, Leather Armor, Bedroll, Hunting Trap
Description: Lived in the wilds, hunting beasts.

Name: Corporate Drone
Starting Items: Datapad, Smart Suit, ID Card, 100 Cr
Description: A low-level employee in a mega-corp.

Name: Smuggler
Starting Items: Flight Jacket, Blaster Pistol, Fake ID, 50 Cr
Description: Moves goods across star systems illegally.

Name: Space Marine
Starting Items: Plasteel Armor, Laser Rifle, Rations, 0 Cr
Description: Trained for void combat and boarding actions.

Name: Xeno-Biologist
Starting Items: Med-Scanner, Field Kit, Sample Vials, 50 Cr
Description: Researches alien life forms.

Name: Investigator
Starting Items: Trenchcoat, Notebook, Flashlight, Revolver
Description: Obsessed with finding the truth.

Name: Survivor
Starting Items: Crowbar, Bandages, Lighter, Canned Food
Description: Escaped something terrible and kept going.

Name: Occultist
Starting Items: Old Tome, Chalk, Ritual Dagger, Candles
Description: Dabbles in forbidden knowledge.

Name: Street Samurai
Starting Items: Katana, Kevlar Vest, Cheap Sunglasses, 20 Ed
Description: Mercenary for hire with an code of honor.

Name: Netrunner
Starting Items: Cyberdeck, Interface Cables, Energy Drink
Description: Lives in the digital world more than the real one.

Name: Gunslinger
Starting Items: Revolver, Holster, Duster, Horse
Description: Fastest hand in the territory.

Name: Outlaw
Starting Items: Repeater Rifle, Bedroll, Whiskey, Bounty Poster
Description: Wanted by the law, loved by no one.

Name: Scavenger
Starting Items: Backpack, Crowbar, Gas Mask, Geiger Counter
Description: Digs through ruins for scraps of the old world.

Name: Road Warrior
Starting Items: Tire Iron, Leather Jacket, Goggles, Jerry Can
Description: Roams the wastes in a cobbled-together vehicle.

Name: Detective
Starting Items: Badge, Service Pistol, Cigarettes, Notepad
Description: A cynical cop or PI working the beat.

Name: Grifter
Starting Items: Fine Clothes, Marked Cards, Fake Jewelry
Description: Makes a living convincing people of lies.

Name: Doctor
Starting Items: Medical Bag, Scalpel, Clean Clothes
Description: Sworn to do no harm.

Name: Brawler
Starting Items: Knuckle Wraps, flask of strong drink
Description: Fights in pits or taverns for coin.
